alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Houston; Jones; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 1:32AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Baldwin, Wilkinson, central Bibb, Twiggs, northeastern Peach, northeastern Houston and Jones Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 132 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Plant Scherer to near Fort Valley, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Milledgeville, Gray, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Gordon, Ivey, McIntyre, Payne, Payne City, Midway-Hardwick, Robins AFB, Meriwether, Marion, Postell, Wayside and Robins Air Force Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM EDT for central and east central Georgia.
